title: Memoirs of the Life of Sir Walter Scott, Volume 6
author: Lockhart, J. G. (John Gibson)
snippet: I     shall lose no time in connecting myself by a general service with     my grand-uncle, the last Haliburton of Dryburgh Abbey, or     Newmains, as they call it.

author: Lockhart, J. G.

title: The complete works of Robert Burns :
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: He died at Newmains, VV'hitekirk, 23rd October, 1795.

title: Notes of foreign travel.
author: Bates, James Hale
snippet: Here Sir Walter Scott was buried on the 26th of October, 1832, in the tomb of his maternal ancestors, the Haliburtons of Newmains, at one time owners of the abbey.

title: Here and there in the Home Land. England, Scotland and Ireland as seen by a Canadian. ... Profusely illustrated
author: Haight, Canniff.
snippet: St. Mary's Aisle, the most beautiful and interesting partof the ruin, contains the burial-place of Sir Walter Scott,who was interred there September 26th, 1832, in tbe tombof his maternal ancestors, the Haliburtons of Newmains, atone time proprietors of the Abbey.
